data.title: Auto-Sklearn for Automated Machine Learning in Python
data.description: Automated Machine Learning (AutoML) refers to techniques for automatically discovering well-performing models for predictive modeling tasks with very little user involvement. Auto-Sklearn is an open-source library for performing AutoML in Python.
